name: perseverant
description: An asynchronous, persistent, localForage inspired, filesystem based storage solution for NodeJS.

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run esm && npm test
scripts.cjs: cp index.js cjs/ && echo 'module.exports = new Perseverant({});' >> cjs/index.js
scripts.esm: cp index.js esm/ && echo 'export default new Perseverant({});' >> esm/index.js

author: Andrea Giammarchi
